raw_body: UNAMBOOWE – (nee de ALWIS) HELENE MARINA,​ at Rest with Jesus. Loving wife of late Ananda Unamboowe,​ much loved mother of Sanjeeva & Swabha,​ loving Aththamma of Priyasha (Perth),​ sister of Astrid Shankhla (Toronto),​ Sunil & Chandra de Alwis and of late Barbara,​ Lt. Col. Ananda,​ Christine Vidyasagara,​ Barnes,​ Clement and Lakdasa. Remains will lie at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour “Restpect” Borella on Wednesday 5th & Thursday 6th February from 10 a.m. The Funeral Service will be held on 6th February at 3.15 p.m. at the Parlour followed by Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the Old Crematorium,​ General Cemetery,​ Borella.                008165
